name: Cute Ponies & Unicorns Jigsaw Puzzles: free logic game for toddlers, preschool kids and little girls
name_original: Cute Ponies & Unicorns Jigsaw Puzzles: free logic game for toddlers, preschool kids and little girls
description:
Beautifully illustrated jigsaw puzzles for kids offers long hours of educational play. Don't wait. Download now!


Key app features:

- 24 fantastic puzzles to choose from
- 2 different game modes – 20 and 48 pieces
- Intuitive play
- Charming music
- A lot of fun for every kids



* You can download this app for free. Please be informed that this app contains ads and in-app purchase to remove it and unlock all content.
